name: Pizza Tower - Halloween Build First Test (Reshared)
name_original: Pizza Tower - Halloween Build First Test (Reshared)
description:
This is the first testing build of Halloween Demo, that was published in 2018 for testing. In this build, peppino wields a gun. To use it, press X and C at the same time, so you will shoot.
Controls in this build:
Z - jump
X - sprint
Arrows - move.
And also, to break those blocks you have to shoot from a gun, because peppino cant break blocks in this build, unless if you dash into them.
And Gun works for everyone (except cool pineapple and forknight (havent tested cheeseslime))
Have Fun!
